alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 3:02PM CDT until May 12 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Rock County in north central Nebraska... Northwestern Holt County in north central Nebraska... Eastern Keya Paha County in north central Nebraska... Western Boyd County in north central Nebraska... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 301 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles north of Newport, or 17 miles northeast of Bassett, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stuart, Naper, Dustin, Mills, Brocksburg and Mariaville. This includes Highway 12 between mile markers 77 and 104. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
